document.full_text: french president nicolas sarkozy softened his usually tough stance on internet regulation at a forum that brought together tech titans in paris, but stark divisions remained on everything from privacy to copyright.
document.title: sarkozy's web initiative faces reality check
lines_and_colors: french president nicolas sarkozy softened his usually tough stance on internet regulation at a forum that brought together tech titans in paris, but stark divisions remained on everything from privacy to copyright.
